mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.enname AS "enname", a.role_type AS "roleType", a.is_sys AS "isSys", a.useable AS "useable", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.sys_type AS "sysType"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM app_role a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.sys_type = 'shequ'
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_role( id, name, enname, role_type, is_sys, useable, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, sys_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{enname}, #{roleType}, #{isSys}, #{useable}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{sysType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE app_role SET name = #{name}, enname = #{enname}, role_type = #{roleType}, is_sys = #{isSys}, useable = #{useable}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, sys_type = #{sysType} WHERE id = #{id}
